SELECT A.APP_ID ,A.APP_NO ,A.APP_NM ,A.APP_HM_ID ,A.CONFIRMOR_ID ,A.APP_CD ,(SELECT C.CODE_NM FROM TB_CODE C WHERE C.CODE_TYPE_CD = 'EXP01' AND C.CODE_CD = A.APP_CD) AS APP_CD_NM ,DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(A.APP_DT,'%Y%m%d%H%i%s'),'%Y/%m/%d') APP_DT ,DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(A.CONFIRM_DT,'%Y%m%d%H%i%s'),'%Y/%m/%d') CONFIRM_DT ,A.REG_ID ,A.REG_NM ,DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(A.REG_DT,'%Y%m%d%H%i%s'),'%Y/%m/%d') REG_DT ,A.SYS_ID ,A.SYS_NM ,A.SYS_DT FROM TB_ASEXPORTAPP A
A.APP_NO LIKE '%$app_no$%'
A.APP_NM LIKE '%$app_nm$%'
A.APP_HM_ID = #app_hm_id#
A.CONFIRMOR_ID = #confirmor_id#
STR_TO_DATE(A.APP_DT,'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#app_dt_st#,'%Y/%m/%d') AND STR_TO_DATE(#app_dt_ed#,'%Y/%m/%d')
STR_TO_DATE(A.CONFIRM_DT,'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#confirm_dt_st#,'%Y/%m/%d') AND STR_TO_DATE(#confirm_dt_ed#,'%Y/%m/%d')
A.APP_CD = #app_cd#
A.REG_ID = #reg_id#
$orderColumn$ $orderType$

A.APP_CD = #app_cd#
